member.name: T:OresundBron.OresundCar
member.summary: Class that creates a car object for traveling over the Oresund bridge

member.name: M:OresundBron.OresundCar.Price(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method that gets the price of a ticket
member.param: true for if the car has a brobizz, false if no
member.returns: Returns 410 if brobizz is used, and 161 if no brobizz is used

member.name: M:OresundBron.OresundCar.VehicleType
member.summary: Method that returns the vehicle type that is buying the ticket

member.name: T:OresundBron.OresundMC
member.summary: Class that creates a motorcycle object for traveling over the Oresund bridge

member.name: M:OresundBron.OresundMC.Price(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method that gets the price of a ticket
member.param: true or false for if you are using a discount (yes or no)
member.returns: Returns 210 for no brobizz and 73 for if a brobizz is used

member.name: M:OresundBron.OresundMC.VehicleType
member.summary: Method that returns the vehicle type that is buying the ticket
